articles.title: T. rex fossil unearthed decades ago is older, more primitive relative of iconic dinosaur, scientists say - CBS News
articles.description: The researchers determined it predated T. rex by up to 7 million years, showing that tyrannosaurs were in North America long before paleontologists previously thought.
articles.content:
The Tyrannosaurus rex seemingly came out of nowhere tens of millions of years ago, with its monstrous teeth and powerful jaws dominating the end of the age of the dinosaurs.
How it came to be is amo… [+3995 chars]

articles.author: CD Goette-Luciak
articles.title: Ecuador’s chaotic turn to drug and narco violence, explained - Vox.com
articles.description: Ecuador was known for peace, but it has become one of the most violent countries in South America.
articles.content: Ecuador, according to its president Daniel Noboa, is now in a state of war. Earlier this week he had announced a state of emergency after the leader of one of the countrys top two gangs escaped from … [+10457 chars]
